_doc: Tracks per-skill evaluation status with independent routing and content dimensions. Updated by tasks .2-.5. routing_status tracks L3/L4 routing quality; content_status tracks L5/L6 content quality.

_transitions..5: sets routing_status/content_status to verified after re-verification
_transitions.overall_status: passing only when all non-untested dimensions are passing/verified/exception

_quality_bar_summary.L4_confusion: PASS (all 7 groups >= 60% accuracy, cross-activation <= 35%, negative controls 88.9%)
_quality_bar_summary.L6_size_impact: PENDING_REVERIFICATION (pre-fix: 51.7% full wins, 2 baseline sweeps; .4 fixes applied but re-run needed from external session)

dotnet-architecture-patterns.notes: Fixed false negative (act-005). Targeted re-run 5fd7c96e: act-005 passes, 17P/2F (neg-016 parse_failure, neg-018 messaging-patterns known issue). Routing verified in .5 sweep.

dotnet-system-commandline.notes: Fixed false negative (act-012). Targeted re-run ca91bea3: act-012 passes, 17P/2F (neg-016 api-security FP, neg-018 messaging-patterns known issue). Routing verified in .5 sweep.

dotnet-resilience.notes: Fixed false negative (act-017). Targeted re-run 8a8e5c77: act-017 and act-054 pass, 18P/2F (neg-016 parse_failure, neg-018 multi-activation). L5 win_rate=100%. Routing verified in .5 sweep.

dotnet-container-deployment.notes: Fixed false positive (neg-004). Targeted re-run 5fd7c96e: neg-004 now passes. Pre-fix run 1ef0e510 confirmed neg-004 was failing. Routing verified in .5 sweep.

dotnet-messaging-patterns.notes: neg-018 (generic RabbitMQ prompt) still activates this skill. Fix attempts in .3 reduced multi-skill FP to single-skill, but could not eliminate without losing .NET messaging coverage. Documented as variance exception: skill correctly activates for .NET messaging prompts; FP is only on deliberately ambiguous negative control. Overall L3 metrics still pass with this exception (2/18 neg controls affected).
dotnet-messaging-patterns.exception_reason: neg-018 is deliberately ambiguous (generic RabbitMQ). Skill must activate for .NET messaging use cases. Cannot further narrow description without losing true positive coverage.

dotnet-efcore-architecture.notes: L4 data group 80% (1 case routed to advisor). Group still above 60% threshold. Verified in .5 sweep.

dotnet-xunit.notes: L6 BASELINE SWEEP fixed: trimmed body from 17.5KB to 8.7KB. L5 pre-fix win_rate=83.3% (already passing). Content fix verification requires external re-run via verify-content-fixes.sh (nested session constraint).
